name: WKCrownDelegate
desc: A collection of methods you can implement to track the user's interaction with the digital crown, receiving notifications when the user rotates the crown or when rotation stops.

items.name: func crownDidRotate(WKCrownSequencer?, rotationalDelta: Double)
items.desc: Called when the user rotates the crown.

items.name: func crownDidBecomeIdle(WKCrownSequencer?)
items.desc: Called when the user stops rotating the crown.
